ORIGAM Documentation : LoadText

Created by Filip Tvrdoň, last modified by Petr Hrehorovský on Jun 08, 2016

Using this method you can read an text file from a server disk drive.

PARAMETERS

Parameter
Type
Description
PathString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)A path to an input text file.
EncodingString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)A IANA character set name. Default (if omitted) is UTF-8.
